sections.text: dEqvA vai saqtramA#sata | Ruddhi#parimitaqm ~MyaSa#skAmAH | tE$&bruvann | yanna#H prathaqmaM ~MyaSa# RuqcCAt | sarvE#ShA-nnaqstath-saqhAsaqditi# | tEShA$m kurukShEqtraM ~MvEdi#rAsIt | tasyai# KANDaqvO da#kShiNAqrddha A#sIt | tUrGna#muttarAqrddhaH | paqrIqNajja#GanAqrddhaH | maqrava# utkaqraH | 1 (10)

tEShA$m maqKaM ~Mvai$ShNaqvaM ~MyaSa# ArcCat | tannya#kAmayata | tEnApA$krAmat | tam dEqvA anvA#yann | yaSO#&vaqruru#thsamAnAH | tasyAqnvAga#tasya | saqvyAddhanuqrajA#yata | dakShi#NAqdiSha#vaH | tasmA#diShudhaqnvam puNya#janma | yaqj~jaja#nmAq hi | 2 (10)

tamEkaq(gm)q santa$m | baqhavOq nABya#dhRuShNuvann | tasmAqdEka#miShudhaqnvina$m | baqhavO#&niShudhaqnvA nABidhRu#ShNuvanti | sO$&smayata | Eka#m mAq santa#m baqhavOq nABya#dhar.ShiShuqriti# | tasya# siShmiyAqNasyaq tEjO&pA$krAmat | tad-dEqvA OSha#dhIShuq nya#mRujuH | tE SyAqmAkA# aBavann | smaqyAkAq vai nAmaiqtE | 3 (10)

tath smaqyAkA#nA(gg) smayAkaqtvam | tasmA$d-dIkShiqtEnA#piqgRuhya# smEtaqvya$m | tEja#sOq dhRutyai$ | sa dhanu#H pratiqShkaByA#tiShThat | tA u#paqdIkA# abruvaqn-vara#m ~MvRuNAmahai | atha# va iqma(gm) ra#ndhayAma | yatraq kva# caq KanA#ma | tadaqpO#&BitRu#NadAqmEti# | tasmA#dupaqdIkAq yatraq kva# caq Kana#nti | tadaqpO#&BitRu#ndanti | 4 (10)

vArE#vRutaq(gg)q hyA#sAm | tasyaq jyAmapyA#dann | tasyaq dhanu#rviqprava#mANaq(gm)q Siraq uda#vartayat | tad dyAvA#pRuthiqvI anuqprAva#rtata | yat prAva#rtata | tat pra#vaqrgya#sya pravargyaqtvam | yadGrA~M(4) ityapa#tat | taddhaqrmasya# Garmaqtvam | maqhaqtO vIqrya#mapaptaqditi# | tan ma#hAvIqrasya# mahAvIraqtvam | 5 (10)

yadaqsyAH saqmaBa#rann | tath saqmrAj~ja#H samrAqTtvam | ta(gg) stRuqtam dEqvatA$strEqdhA vya#gRuhNata | aqgniH prA#tassavaqnam | indrOq mAddhya#ndinaq(gm)q sava#nam | viSvE# dEqvAstRu#tIyasavaqnam | tEnApa#SIrShNA yaqj~jEnaq yaja#mAnAH | nASiShOq&vAru#ndhata | na su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkamaqBya#jayann | tE dEqvA aqSvinA#vabruvann | 6 (10)

BiqShajauq vai stha#H | iqdaM ~Myaqj~jasyaq SiraqH prati#dhattaqmiti# | tAva#brUtAqM ~Mvara#m ~MvRuNAvahai | graha# Eqva nAqvatrApi# gRuhyatAqmiti# | tAByA#-mEqtamA$Sviqna-ma#gRuhNann | tAvEqtad-yaqj~jasyaq SiraqH pratya#dhattAm | yat pra#vaqrgya#H | tEnaq saSI$rShNA yaqj~jEnaq yaja#mAnAH | avAqSiShO&ru#ndhata | aqBi su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkama#jayann ( ) | yat pra#vaqrgya#m pravRuqNakti# | yaqj~jasyaiqva tacCiraqH prati#dadhAti | tEnaq saSI$rShNA yaqj~jEnaq yaja#mAnaH | avAqSiShO# ruqndhE | aqBi su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkam ja#yati | tasmA#dEqSha A$Sviqnapra#vayA iva | yat pra#vaqrgya#H || 7 (17) anuvAkam - 2

sAqviqtram ju#hOtiq prasU$tyai | caqtuqrgRuqhIqtEna# juhOti | catu#ShpAdaH paqSava#H | paqSUnEqvAva#rundhE | cata#srOq diSa#H | diqkShvE#va prati#tiShThati | CandA(gm)#si dEqvEByO&pA$krAmann | na vO#&BAqgAni# haqvyaM ~Mva#kShyAmaq iti# | tEBya# Eqta-cca#turgRuhIqta-ma#dhArayann | puqrOqnuqvAqkyA#yai yAqjyA#yai | 8 (10)

dEqvatA#yai vaShaTkAqrAya# | yacca#turgRuhIqtam juqhOti# | CandA(gg)#syEqva tat prI#NAti | tAnya#sya prIqtAni# dEqvEByO# haqvyaM ~Mva#hanti | braqhmaqvAqdinO# vadanti | hOqtaqvya#m dIkShiqtasya# gRuqhA(3) i na hO#taqvyA(3) miti# | haqvirvai dI$kShiqtaH | yajju#huqyAt | haqviShkRu#taqM ~Myaja#mAnamaqgnau prada#ddhyAt | yanna ju#huqyAt | 9 (10)

yaqj~jaqpaqruraqntari#yAt | yaju#rEqva va#dEt | na haqviShkRu#taqM ~Myaja#mAnamaqgnau praqdadhA#ti | na ya#j~japaqruraqntarE#ti | gAqyaqtrI CandAq(gg)qsyatya#manyata | tasyai# vaShaTkAqrO$&Byayyaq SirO$&cCinat | tasyai$ dvEqdhA rasaqH parA#&patat | pRuqthiqvImaqrddhaH prAvi#Sat | paqSUnaqrddhaH | yaH pRu#thiqvIm prAvi#Sat | 10 (10)

sa Ka#diqrO#&Bavat | yaH paqSUn | sO#&jAm | yatKA#diqryaBriqr Bava#ti | Canda#sAmEqva rasE#na yaqj~jasyaq SiraqH samBa#rati | yadaudu#mbarI | UrgvA u#duqmbara#H | Uqrjaiva yaqj~jasyaq SiraqH samBa#rati | yad-vai#NaqvI | tEjOq vai vENu#H | 11 (10)

tEja#saiqva yaqj~jasyaq SiraqH samBa#rati | yad-vaika#~gkatI | BA EqvAva#rundhE | dEqvasya# tvA saviqtuH pra#saqva ityaBriqmAda#ttEq prasU$tyai | aqSvinO$r-bAqhuByAqmityA#ha | aqSvinauq hi dEqvAnA#maddhvaqryU AstA$m | pUqShNO hastA$ByAqmityAhaq yatyai$ | vajra# ivaq vA EqShA | yadaBri#H | aBri#rasiq nAri#raqsItyA#haq SAntyai$ | 12 (10)

aqddhvaqraqkRud-dEqvEByaq ityA#ha | yaqj~jO vA a#ddhvaqraH | yaqj~jaqkRud-dEqvEByaq itiq vAvaitadA#ha | utti#ShTha brahmaNaspataq ityA#ha | brahma#Naiqva yaqj~jasyaq SirO&cCai#ti | praituq brahma#NaqspatiqrityA#ha | prEtyaiqva yaqj~jasyaq SirO&cCai#ti | pra dEqvyE#tu sUqnRutEtyA#ha | yaqj~jO vai sUqnRutA$ | acCA# vIqrannarya#m paq~gktirA#dhasaqmityA#ha | 13 (10)

pA~gktOq hi yaqj~jaH | dEqvA yaqj~janna#yantu naq ityA#ha | dEqvAnEqva ya#j~jaqniya#H kurutE | dEvI$ dyAvApRuthivIq anu# mE ma(gm)sAthAqmityA#ha | AqByAmEqvAnu#matO yaqj~jasyaq SiraqH samBa#rati | RuqddhyAsa#maqdya maqKasyaq Siraq ityA#ha | yaqj~jO vai maqKaH | RuqddhyAsa#maqdya yaqj~jasyaq Siraq itiq vAvaitadA#ha | maqKAya# tvA maqKasya# tvA SIqrShNa ityA#ha | niqrdiSyaiqvaina#ddharati | 14 (10)

trir.ha#rati | traya# iqmE lOqkAH | EqBya Eqva lOqkEByO# yaqj~jasyaq SiraqH samBa#rati | tUqShNIm ca#tuqrtha(gm) ha#rati | apa#rimitAdEqva yaqj~jasyaq SiraqH samBa#rati | mRuqtKaqnAdagrE# harati | tasmA$n mRutKaqnaH ka#ruqNya#tamaH | iyaqtyagra# AsIqrityA#ha | aqsyAmEqvACa#mbaTkAraM ~Myaqj~jasyaq SiraqH samBa#rati | Urjaqm ~MvA Eqta(gm) rasa#m pRuthiqvyA u#paqdIkAq uddi#hanti | 15 (10)

yad-vaqlmIka$m | yad-va#lmIkavaqpA sa#mBAqrO Bava#ti | Urja#mEqva rasa#m pRuthiqvyA ava#rundhE | athOq SrOtra#mEqva | SrOtraq(gg)q hyE#tat pRu#thiqvyAH | yad-vaqlmIka#H | aba#dhirO Bavati | ya EqvaM ~MvEda# | indrO# vRuqtrAyaq vajraqmuda#yacCat | sa yatra#yatra paqrAkra#mata | 16 (10)

tannAddhri#yata | sa pU#tIkastaqmbE parA$kramata | sO$&ddhriyata | sO$&bravIt | UqtiM ~Mvai mE# dhAq iti# | tadUqtIkA#nA-mUtIkaqtvam | yadUqtIkAq Bava#nti | yaqj~jAyaiqvOtim da#dhati | aqgniqjA a#si praqjApa#tEq rEtaq ityA#ha | ya Eqva rasa#H paqSUn prAvi#Sat | 17 (10)

tamEqvAva#rundhE | pa~jcaiqtE sa#mBAqrA Ba#vanti | pA~gktO# yaqj~jaH | yAvA#nEqva yaqj~jaH | tasyaq SiraqH samBa#rati | yadgrAqmyANA$m paSUqnA~jcarma#NA saqmBarE$t | grAqmyAn paqSU~jCuqcA&rpa#yEt | kRuqShNAqjiqnEnaq samBa#rati | AqraqNyAnEqva paqSU~jCuqcA&rpa#yati | tasmA$th-saqmAva#t-paSUqnAm praqjAya#mAnAnAm | 18 (10)

AqraqNyAH paqSavaqH kanI#yA(gm)saH | SuqcA hyRu#tAH | lOqmaqtaH samBa#rati | atOq hya#syaq mEddhya$m | paqriqgRuhyA ya#nti | rakSha#sAqmapa#hatyai | baqhavO# haranti | apa#citimEqvAsmi#n dadhati | uddha#tEq sika#tOpOptEq pari#SritEq nida#dhatiq SAntyai$ | mada#ntIBiqrupa# sRujati | 19 (10)

tEja# EqvAsmi#n dadhAti | madhu# tvA madhuqlA ka#rOqtvityA#ha | brahma#NaiqvAsmiqn -tEjO# dadhAti | yadgrAqmyANAqm pAtrA#NAm kaqpAlai$H sa(gm)sRuqjEt | grAqmyANiq pAtrA#Ni SuqcA&rpa#yEt | aqrmaqkaqpAqlaiH sa(gm)sRu#jati | EqtAniq vA a#nupajIvanIqyAni# | tAnyEqva SuqcA&rpa#yati | Sarka#rABiqH sa(gm)sRu#jatiq dhRutyai$ | athO# SaqntvAya# ( ) | aqjaqlOqmaiH sa(gm)sRu#jati | EqShA vA aqgnEH priqyA taqnUH | yadaqjA | priqyayaiqvaina#m taqnuvAq sa(gm)sRu#jati | athOq tEja#sA | kRuqShNAqjiqnasyaq lOma#BiqH sa(gm)sRu#jati | yaqj~jO vai kRu#ShNAjiqnam | yaqj~jEnaiqva yaqj~ja(gm) sa(gm)sRu#jati || 20 (18) (yAqjA#yaiq - na ju#huqyA - davi#Saqd - vENaqH - SAntyai# - paq~gktirA#dhasaqmityA#ha - harati - dihanti - paqrAkra#maq - tAvi#Sat - praqjAya#mAnAnA(gm) - sRujati - SaqntvAyAq ShTau ca#) (A2) anuvAkam - 3

pari#SritE karOti | braqhmaqvaqrcaqsasyaq pari#gRuhItyai | na kuqrvannaqBi prA$NyAt | yat kuqrvanna#Bi prAqNyAt | prAqNA~jCuqcA&rpa#yEt | aqpaqhAyaq prANi#ti | prAqNAnA$m gOpIqthAya# | na pra#vaqrgya#m-cAdiqtyam-cAqntarE#yAt | yada#ntarEqyAt | duqScarmA$ syAt | 21 (10)

tasmAqnnAntaqrAyya$m | AqtmanO# gOpIqthAya# | vENu#nA karOti | tEjOq vai vENu#H | tEja#H pravaqrgya#H | tEja#saiqva tEjaqH sama#rddhayati | maqKasyaq SirOq&sItyA#ha | yaqj~jO vai maqKaH | tasyaiqtacCira#H | yat pra#vaqrgya#H | 22 (10)

tasmA#dEqvamA#ha | yaqj~jasya# paqdE sthaq ityA#ha | yaqj~jasyaq hyE#tE paqdE | athOq prati#ShThityai | gAqyaqtrENa# tvAq Canda#sA karOqmItyA#ha | CandO#BirEqvaina#m karOti | tryu#ddhim karOti | traya# iqmE lOqkAH | EqShAm ~MlOqkAnAqmAptyai$ | CandO#BiH karOti | 23 (10)

vIqrya#m ~Mvai CandA(gm)#si | vIqryE#Naiqvaina#m karOti | yaju#ShAq bila#m karOtiq vyAvRu#yai | iya#ntam karOti | praqjApa#tinA yaj~jamuqKEnaq sammi#tam | iya#ntam karOti | yaqj~jaqpaqruShAq sammi#tam | iya#ntam karOti | EqtAvaqdvai puru#ShE vIqrya$m | vIqrya#sammitam | 24 (10)

apa#rimitam karOti | apa#rimitaqsyAva#ruddhyai | paqriqgrIqvam ka#rOtiq dhRutyai$ | sUrya#syaq hara#sA SrAqyEtyA#ha | yaqthAqyaqjurEqvaitat | aqSvaqSaqkEna# dhUpayati | prAqjAqpaqtyO vA aSva#H sayOniqtvAya# | vRuShNOq aSva#sya niqShpadaqsItyA#ha | aqsau vA A#diqtyO vRuShA&Sva#H | tasyaq CandA(gm)#si niqShpat | 25 (10)

CandO#BirEqvaina#m dhUpayati | aqrciShE$ tvA SOqciShEq tvEtyA#ha | tEja# EqvAsmi#n dadhAti | vAqruqNO#&BIddha#H | maiqtriyOpai#tiq SAntyai$ | siddhyaiq tvEtyA#ha | yaqthAqyaqjurEqvaitat | dEqvastvA# saviqtOdva#paqtvityA#ha | saqviqtRupra#sUta Eqvainaqm brahma#NA dEqvatA#Biqrudva#pati | apa#dyamAnaH pRuthiqvyAmASAq diSaq ApRuqNEtyA#ha | 26 (10)

tasmA#daqgniH sarvAq diSO&nuq viBA#ti | utti#ShTha bRuqhan-Ba#vOqrddhvasti#ShTha dhruqvastvamityA#haq prati#ShThityai | IqSvaqrO vA EqShO$&ndhO Bavi#tOH | yaH pra#vaqrgya#maqnvIkSha#tE | sUrya#sya tvAq cakShuqShA&nvI$kShaq ityA#ha | cakShu#ShO gOpIqthAya# | RuqjavE$ tvA sAqdhavE$ tvA sukShiqtyai tvAq BUtyaiq tvEtyA#ha | iqyaM ~MvA RuqjuH | aqntari#kSha(gm) sAqdhu | aqsau su#kShiqtiH | 27 (10)

diSOq BUti#H | iqmAnEqvAsmai# lOqkAn ka#lpayati | athOq prati#ShThityai | iqda-maqha-maqmumA#muShyAyaqNam ~MviqSA paqSuBi#r-brahmavarcaqsEnaq paryU#hAqmItyA#ha | viqSaivaina#m paqSuBi#r-brahmavarcaqsEnaq paryU#hati | viqSEti# rAjaqnya#sya brUyAt | viqSaivainaqm paryU#hati | paqSuBiqritiq vaiSya#sya | paqSuBi#rEqvainaqm paryU#hati | aqsuqrya#m pAtraqmanA$cCRuNNam | 28 (10)

AcCRu#Natti | dEqvaqtrA&ka#H | aqjaqkShIqrENAcCRu#Natti | paqraqmaM ~MvA Eqtat paya#H | yada#jakShIqram | paqraqmENaiqvainaqm payaqsA&&cCRu#Natti | yaju#ShAq vyAvRu#ttyai | CandO#BiqrAcCRu#Natti | CandO#BiqrvA EqSha kri#yatE | CandO#BirEqva CandAq(gg)qsyAcCRu#Natti ( ) | CRuqndhi vAcaqmityA#ha | vAca#mEqvAva#rundhE | CRuqndhyUrjaqmityA#ha | Urja#mEqvAva#rundhE | CRuqndhi haqvirityA#ha | haqvirEqvAka#H | dEva# puraScara saqGyAsaqntvEtyA#ha | yaqthAqyaqjurEqvaitat || 29 (18) (syAqd- yat pra#vaqrgya#H - CandO#BiH karOti - vIqrya# sammitaqm - CandA(gm)#si niqShpat - pRuqNEtyA#ha - sukShiqti - ranA$cCRuNNaqm - CandAq(gg)qsyAcCRu#Na ttyaqShTau ca#) (A3) anuvAkam - 4

brahmaqn praca#riShyAmOq hOta#r-GaqrmamaqBiShTuqhItyA#ha | EqSha vA Eqtar.hiq bRuhaqspati#H | yadbraqhmA | tasmA# Eqva pra#tiqprOcyaq praca#rati | AqtmanO&nA$rtyai | yaqmAya# tvA maqKAyaq tvEtyA#ha | EqtA vA Eqtasya# dEqvatA$H | tABi#rEqvainaq(gm)q sama#rddhayati | mada#ntIBiqH prOkSha#ti | tEja# EqvAsmi#n dadhAti | 30 (10)

aqBiqpUqrvam prOkSha#ti | aqBiqpUqrva-mEqvAsmiqn-tEjO# dadhAti | triH prOkSha#ti | tryA#vRuqddhi yaqj~jaH | athO# mEddhyaqtvAya# | hOtA&nvA#ha | rakSha#sAqmapa#hatyai | ana#vAnam | prAqNAnAq(gm)q santa#tyai | triqShTuBa#H saqtIr-gA#yaqtrIriqvAnvA#ha | 31 (10)

gAqyaqtrO hi prAqNaH | prAqNamEqva yaja#mAnE dadhAti | santa#taqmanvA#ha | prAqNAnA#maqnnAdya#syaq santa#tyai | athOq rakSha#sAqmapa#hatyai | yat pari#mitA anubrUqyAt | pari#mitaqmava#rundhIta | apa#rimitAq anvA#ha | apa#rimitaqsyAva#ruddhyai | SirOq vA Eqtad-yaqj~jasya# | 32 (10)

yat pra#vaqrgya#H | U~grmu~jjA$H | yan mauq~jjO vEqdO Bava#ti | Uqrjaiva yaqj~jasyaq SiraqH sama#rddhayati | prAqNAqhuqtIr-ju#hOti | prAqNAnEqva yaja#mAnE dadhAti | saqpta ju#hOti | saqpta vai SI#r.ShaqNyA$H prAqNAH | prAqNAnEqvAsmi#n dadhAti | dEqvastvA# saviqtA maddhvA#&naqktvityA#ha | 33 (10)

tEja#saiqvaina#manakti | pRuqthiqvIm tapa#sastrAyaqsvEtiq hira#NyaqmupA$syati | aqsyA ana#tidAhAya | SirOq vA Eqtad-yaqj~jasya# | yat pra#vaqrgya#H | aqgniH sarvA# dEqvatA$H | praqlaqvAnAqdIpyOpA$syati | dEqvatA$svEqva yaqj~jasyaq SiraqH prati#dadhAti | apra#tiSIrNAgram Bavati | Eqtad-ba#rhiqrhyE#ShaH | 34 (10)

aqrcira#si SOqciraqsItyA#ha | tEja# EqvAsmi#n brahmavarcaqsam da#dhAti | sa(gm)sI#dasva maqhA(gm) aqsItyA#ha | maqhAn. hyE#ShaH | braqhmaqvAqdinO# vadanti | EqtE vAva ta Ruqtvija#H | yE da#r.SapUrNamAqsayO$H | atha# kaqthA hOtAq yaja#mAnAyAqSiShOq nASA$staq iti# | puqrastA#dASIqH Kaluq vA aqnyO yaqj~jaH | uqpari#ShTAdASIraqnyaH | 35 (10)

aqnAqdhRuqShyA puqrastAqditiq yadEqtAniq yajUq(gg)qShyAha# | SIqrq.Shaqta Eqva yaqj~jasyaq yaja#mAna AqSiShO&va#rundhE | Ayu#H puqrastA#dAha | praqjAm da#kShiNaqtaH | prAqNam paqScAt | SrOtra#muttaraqtaH | vidhRu#timuqpari#ShTAt | prAqNAnEqvAsmai# saqmIcO# dadhAti | IqSvaqrO vA EqSha diSO&nUnma#ditOH | yandiSO&nu# vyAsthAqpaya#nti | 36 (10)

manOqraSvA#&siq BUri#puqtrEtIqmA-maqBimRu#Sati | iqyaM ~Mvai manOqraSvAq BUri#putrA | aqsyAmEqva prati#tiShThaqtyanu#nmAdAya | sUqpaqsadA# mE BUyAq mA mA# hi(gm)sIqrityAqhAhi(gm)#sAyai | cita#H stha pariqcitaq ityA#ha | apa#citimEqvAsmi#n dadhAti | SirOq vA Eqtad-yaqj~jasya# | yat pra#vaqrgya#H | aqsau Kaluq vA A#diqtyaH pra#vaqrgya#H | tasya# maqrutO# raqSmaya#H | 37 (10)

svAhA# maqrudBiqH pari#SrayaqsvEtyA#ha | aqmumEqvAdiqtya(gm) raqSmiBiqH paryU#hati | tasmA#-daqsAvA#diqtyO#&muShmi#n ~MlOqkE raqSmiBiqH paryU#DhaH | tasmAqd-rAjA# viqSA paryU#DhaH | tasmA$d-grAmaqNIH sa#jAqtaiH paryU#DhaH | aqgnEH sRuqShTasya# yaqtaH | vika#~gkataqm BA A$rcCat | yad vaika#~gkatAH pariqdhayOq Bava#nti | BA EqvAva#rundhE | dvAda#Sa Bavanti | 38 (10)
